entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -35.7°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
